Raw xml 


<Location xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir">
  <id value="hospital1"/>
  <meta>
    <profile
             value="http://hl7.org/fhir/ig/vhdir/StructureDefinition/vhdir-location"/>

  <text>
    <status value="generated"/>

  </text>
  <extension
             url="http://hl7.org/fhir/ig/vhdir/StructureDefinition/accessibility">
    <valueCodeableConcept>
      <coding>
        <system
                value="http://hl7.org/fhir/ig/vhdir/CodeSystem/codesystem-accessibility"/>

                value="http://hl7.org/fhir/ig/vhdir/CodeSystem/codesystem-ehrcharacteristics"/>

      </valueCoding>
    </extension>
    <extension url="patientAccess">
      <valueCodeableConcept>
        <coding>
          <system
                  value="http://hl7.org/fhir/ig/vhdir/CodeSystem/codesystem-ehrcharacteristics"/>

  <status value="active"/>
  <name value="Founding Fathers Memorial Hospital"/>

  <type>
    <coding>
      <system value="http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/RoleCode"/>
      <code value="HOSP"/>
      <display value="Hospital"/>
      <userSelected value="true"/>
    </coding>
  </type>
  <telecom>
    <extension

    </coding>

    <longitude value="38.8859395"/>
    <latitude value="-77.016469"/>

  <managingOrganization>

  <endpoint>
    <reference value="http://hl7.org/fhir/ig/vhdir/Endpoint/e-12345"/>
    <display value="Founding Fathers Memorial Hospital FHIR Server"/>

</Location>
